meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Val Hannon Alan Hait Elliot Yates Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6977.

td.p: Val Hannon, a library circulation clerk from Allen, Texas
Alan Hait, an employee benefits consultant from Wilton Manors, Florida
Elliot Yates, an opera producer from New York, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $29,201)

tr.td: WATCH THE BIRDIE
FOOD & RELIGION
MUSICAL INSTRUMENTS
VOWEL, CONSONANT, VOWEL
(Alex: Each correct response just three letters.)
A LONG TIME AGO
A VEGAS HOTEL, OR...

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_3_5', 'clue_DJ_3_5_stuck', '(Elliot: What is anise seed?)
(Alex: We want more than that.)
(Elliot: Um... what is anise seed spice?)
[Laughter]
(Alan: What is anisette?)
...
(Alex: It\'s named for its shape and for another spice. Anise or "annis" is the other spice. The shape is star. We needed both words. [*] or [*] seed.)

star anise

ElliotAlan
Triple Stumper
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_3_5', 'clue_DJ_3_5_stuck', 'One of the ingredients in Chinese five-spice powder is this spice seen here, named for its shape & for another spice')
